entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
